title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: whose name was Hallblithe: he was fair, strong, and not untried in
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: battle; he was of the House of the Raven of old time.

author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

author: Morris, William

author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: they were to be wedded on Midsummer Night.

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

The Story of the Glittering Plain

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: long, Hallblithe sat before the porch of the house smoothing an ash stave
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: for his spear, and he heard the sound of horse-hoofs drawing nigh, and he
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: looked up and saw folk riding toward the house, and so presently they
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: rode through the garth gate; and there was no man but he about the house,
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: so he rose up and went to meet them, and he saw that they were but three
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: in company: they had weapons with them, and their horses were of the
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: best; but they were no fellowship for a man to be afraid of; for two of
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: them were old and feeble, and the third was dark and sad, and drooping of
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: aspect: it seemed as if they had ridden far and fast, for their spurs
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: were bloody and their horses all a-sweat.
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: Hallblithe hailed them kindly and said: "Ye are way-worn, and maybe ye
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: have to ride further; so light down and come into the house, and take
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: bite and sup, and hay and corn also for your horses; and then if ye needs
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: must ride on your way, depart when ye are rested; or else if ye may, then
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: abide here night-long, and go your ways to-morrow, and meantime that
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: which is ours shall be yours, and all shall be free to you."
title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: Then spake the oldest of the elders in a high piping voice and said:
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: "Young man, we thank thee; but though the days of the springtide are
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: waxing, the hours of our lives are waning; nor may we abide unless thou
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: canst truly tell us that this is the Land of the Glittering Plain: and if
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: that be so, then delay not, lead us to thy lord, and perhaps he will make
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: us content."
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: Spake he who was somewhat less stricken in years than the first: "Thanks
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: have thou! but we need something more than meat and drink, to wit the
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: Land of Living Men.  And Oh! but the time presses."
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: Spake the sad and sorry carle: "We seek the Land where the days are many:
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: so many that he who hath forgotten how to laugh, may learn the craft
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: again, and forget the days of Sorrow."
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: Then they all three cried aloud and said:
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: "Is this the Land?  Is this the Land?"
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: But Hallblithe wondered, and he laughed and said: "Wayfarers, look under
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: the sun down the plain which lieth betwixt the mountains and the sea, and
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: ye shall behold the meadows all gleaming with the spring lilies; yet do
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: we not call this the Glittering Plain, but Cleveland by the Sea.  Here
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: men die when their hour comes, nor know I if the days of their life be
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: long enough for the forgetting of sorrow; for I am young and not yet a
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: yokefellow of sorrow; but this I know, that they are long enough for the
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: doing of deeds that shall not die.  And as for Lord, I know not this
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:

text: ye will."

author: Morris, William

The Story of the Glittering Plain

text: Then arose a white-headed carle from a table nigh to the dais, whose
title:

author: Morris, William

text: black raiment was well adorned with gold.  Despite his years his face was
title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying

title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: mouth, and with eyes still bright and grey.  He spake: "O folk, I find
title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: that the Erne hath done well in cherishing this guest.  For first, if he
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: hath beguiled us, he did it not save by the furtherance and sleight of
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: our own kinsman; therefore if any one is to die for beguiling us, let it
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: be the Puny Fox.  Secondly, we may well wot that heavy need hath driven
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: the man to this beguilement; and I say that it was no unmanly deed for
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: him to enter our hall and beguile us with his sleight; and that he hath
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: played out the play right well and cunningly with the wisdom of a
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: warrior.  Thirdly, the manliness of him is well proven, in that having
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: overcome us in sleight, he hath spoken out the sooth concerning our
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: beguilement and hath made himself our foeman and captive, when he might
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: have sat down by us as our guest, freely and in all honour.  And this he
title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying

title:
The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
author: Morris, William

text: in that which trieth manhood.  Moreover, ye shall not forget that he is
title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying

title:

Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying

title:
